# Simulate Data

set.seed(52242)

X <- rnorm(100)
M <- 0.5*X + rnorm(100)

mydata <- data.frame(X = X, Y = Y, M = M)

# Mediation

## Model Syntax

```{r}
mediationModel <- '
# direct effect (c)
Y ~ c*X

# mediator
M ~ a*X
Y ~ b*M

# indirect effect (a*b)
ab := a*b

# total effect (direct effect + indirect effect)
total := c + (a*b)
'
```

## Fit the Model

```{r}
mediationFit <- sem(model,
                    data = mydata,
                    se = "bootstrap",
                    bootstrap = 1000, # generally use 10,000 bootstrap draws; this example uses 1,000 for speed
                    missing = "ML",
                    estimator = "ML",
                    std.lv = TRUE)
```

## Summary Output

```{r}
summary(mediationFit,
        fit.measures = TRUE,
        standardized = TRUE,
        rsquare = TRUE)
```

## Indirect Effect

```{r}
parameterEstimates(fit,
                   boot.ci.type = "bca.simple",
                   standardized = TRUE)
```
